answer:
ImmunizeBC's health unit finder is here. The Kamloops Health Centre is at 519 Columbia St. Kamloops , BC V2C 2T8. Call to confirm at 250-851-7300.
Immunization Nurse
question: My daughter is 3 months old has an appointment to get her vaccinations done tomorrow and I was wondering where in the North shore Kamloops BC is the building. To take her to?
